name: Minima02: Pollination
description:
A relaxing chain reaction game.

Tap falling seeds to explode their insides and pollinate the landscape to grow reward giving plants.

Here are some quotes from folk who've played it:
"Its like a friendly Extend Extra" - @daphaknee
"Cool Unity-built chain explosion game" - @davidsgallant
"A simple game that's surprisingly satisfying" - bnbgaming.com
"Really fun, point and click; it's like Minecraft-world puyo chains" - @captain_panties
"As simple as pure; should fit in a pocket; better than Angry Birds; about making decisions, nature and life" - @Phen0m77
